titlealts.searchtitle: NHS Business Definition: Sport and Exercise Psychologist - Description

body.p: A Sport and Exercise Psychologist Â is a PERSON .
A Sport and Exercise Psychologist is recognised by the British Psychological Society .
Sport and Exercise Psychologists use scientific principles to investigate and understand the behaviour, mental processes, and well-being of people who are involved in sport and exercise.
are concerned with helping people improve their performance and enjoyment in sport, and those factors which encourage people to take up and adhere to a physically active lifestyle.
